original_text: and you eat the food of the land, present a portion as an offering to the Lord.
korean_text: 그 땅의 양식을 먹을 때에 여호와께 거제를 드리되

sentences.original_text: and you eat the food of the land
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 네가 그 땅의 음식을 먹을 때에

sentences.original_text: present a portion as an offering to the Lord
